title: Canaan and His Father
marks: Signature and Date LRC below image, in black ink: [Sheila Farrell 199
description: boy wearing a pink cap, blue shirt and black slip-on tennis shoes, resting his chin against a skateboard held in front of him; boy is seated at the edge of a porch in front of a large U.S. flag; man with beard and glasses seated on porch at right
creditline: Gift of Dr. James L. and Mrs. Bambi P. Anderson
